entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Kakabeka Falls
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:06 PM EST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -5.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Thunder Bay Airport 6:00 PM EST Saturday 11 March 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -5.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.3 kPa falling
Visibility: 32.2 km
Humidity: 55 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -12.7°C
Wind: E 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Snow beginning this evening. Local blowing snow overnight. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming northeast 30 gusting to 50 late this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow. Local blowing snow in the morning. Local amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near midnight then mainly cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light late in the evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 15 in the evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 11 March 2023
